tool.name: qiime2 demux filter-samples
tool.description: Filter samples out of demultiplexed data.

param.name: demux
param.label: demux: SampleData[SequencesWithQuality¹ | PairedEndSequencesWithQuality² | JoinedSequencesWithQuality³]
param.help: [required] The demultiplexed data from which samples should be filtered.

repeat.name: metadata
repeat.help: [required] Sample metadata indicating which sample ids to filter. The optional `where` parameter may be used to filter ids based on specified conditions in the metadata. The optional `exclude_ids` parameter may be used to exclude the ids specified in the metadata from the filter.
repeat.title: metadata: Metadata

param.name: __q2galaxy__GUI__select__
param.label: where: Str
param.help: [optional] Optional SQLite WHERE clause specifying sample metadata criteria that must be met to be included in the filtered data. If not provided, all samples in `metadata` that are also in the demultiplexed data will be retained.

param.name: exclude_ids
param.label: exclude_ids: Bool
param.help: [default: No] Defaults to False. If True, the samples selected by the `metadata` and optional `where` parameter will be excluded from the filtered data.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: demux filter-samples ============================= Filter samples out of demultiplexed data.
Outputs: -------- :filtered_demux.qza: Filtered demultiplexed data.
|
Description: ------------ Filter samples indicated in given metadata out of demultiplexed data. Specific samples can be further selected with the WHERE clause, and the `exclude_ids` parameter allows for filtering of all samples not specified.
|
